title: Anion-promoted CB[6] macromolecules dissolution for stable Zn-ion batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01225A, Paper
Yang Xiaodong, Yuwei Zhao, Shuangkun Lv, Leheng Zhong, Chencheng Yue, Shuai Zhan, Linwei Zhao, Chunfang Wang, Xuejin Li, Xiaoya Liu, Zijie Tang, Chunsun Zhang, Chunyi Zhi, Haiming Lv, Haiming Lv (Lyu)
The electrode/electrolyte interface of inhomogeneous Zn deposition and water-induced side reactions have hampered the practical application of rechargeable Zn-ion batteries. By a strategy of anionic facilitation of macromolecule dissolution, we...
